entities.name: bell
entities.description: Bell is mentioned as scoring twice in a few seconds, indicating that they are participating in some sort of game or competition.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is watching Bell play and is concerned about the Keeper being Ron. He looks away frequently to avoid detection.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a possible Keeper, which suggests that he may be involved in the game or competition that Bell and Harry are watching.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge's quill is heard scratching on parchment, indicating that she is writing something. This suggests that she may be keeping track of the game or competition in some way.

entities.name: bludge
entities.description: Bludge is mentioned as being dodged exceptionally well by one of the players, but then fumbled an easy save. This suggests that Bludge may be a player or a team in the game or competition.

entities.name: keeper
entities.description: The Keeper is mentioned as being Ron, which suggests that they are responsible for keeping track of the game or competition in some way.

relationships.description: Bell is being watched by Harry, who is concerned about the Keeper being Ron and looks away frequently to avoid detection.
Umbridge's quill is heard scratching on parchment, indicating that she is writing about Bludge and the game or competition.
